name: ANTI-CHICKEN (316025)
description:
You play as Bingo a fox who's egg has been stolen by THE chicken, your goal? To get through THE chickens alles and get to him in order to reclaim your egg. 

You will have to manoeuvre through platforms, enemies, deadly drops and water all out to stop you from reclaiming your egg and lastly THE chicken you must battle to the death in order to win the game.
